result.markdown: --- title: Warwick-branded plots, presentations and websites using Quarto and R description: | Introducing warwickplots, warwickpres, and warwickbrand date: 2024-06-10 author: - name: Ella Kaye image: warwick-colours-logo.png # N.B. Don't use "" in image-alt image-alt: | Five vertical strips in bright colours: teal, blue, orange, red, yellow. Horizontally across them, a dark purple rectangle, with the University of Warwick logo in white on that. --- ::: {.cell} ::: ` slides`{=html} ` materials`{=html} ## Overview Introducing three related resources, for those affiliated with the University of Warwick to use the university's [brand](https://warwick.ac.uk/about/brand/) in their plots, presentation and websites: - [**warwickplots**](https://github.com/Warwick-Stats-Resources/warwickplots) An R package with colour palettes and a ggplot2 theme - [**warwickpres**](https://github.com/Warwick-Stats-Resources/warwickpres) A Quarto Revealjs extension for presentations - [**warwickcourse**](https://github.com/Warwick-Stats-Resources/warwickcourse) A GitHub template for creating course/workshop websites with Quarto This talk lets you know that these resources *exist*, what they *look* like, gives a quick guide to getting started using them, and lets you know where to learn more. ## Event details **Group:** [Warwick R User Group](https://warwickrug.github.io) **Talk listing:** [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/warwickrug/events/301363056) **Date:** June 10th, 2024 **Time:** 12:00 **Location:** Dirty Duck, University of Warwick ## Slides Keyboard shortcuts for slideshow (once you've clicked inside it): - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides - Use o for an overview of all slides - Use ? for an overview more keyboard shortcuts - Click the hamburger menu in the bottom left corner of the slide deck for more options - f to toggle full screen doesn't work from this page. Go to [slides](https://warwick-stats-resources.github.io/warwickbrand-talk/) and use that shortcut from there instead
